Summaries.eng: A long, long time ago, there was a prestigious school called "Ryuuguu Elementary School" that produced many masterpiece characters. One day, an ordinary boy named Meisaku Matsuda enrolled at the school. Little did he know that the place for learning was filled with crazy characters like Sweets, the energetic idiot; Musubi, a rice ball who gets angry when called "onigiri"; Nokio, a narcissistic self-proclaimed robot; and Bolt, who's clearly faster than a rabbit. Surrounded by such unique characters, will Meisaku be able to graduate as a splendid masterpiece character?
Summaries.jpn:
数々の名作キャラを輩出する名門「竜宮小」という学校がありました。
ある日「松田名作」というフツーの男の子が竜宮小に入学。
超バカで超ハイテンションの「スウィーツ」、おにぎりと言われるとキレる「むすび」
ナルシストで自称ロボの「ノキオ」、明らかにウサギよりも足が速い「ボルト」など
濃いキャラに囲まれた名作くんは、立派な名作キャラとして卒業できるのでしょうか――
